name: Salah Time
tagline: Simple cross-platform application to calculate Salah timings
body:
### Salah Time.
An easy way to see whether the time is right to offer a specific Salah at your location.

## Upcoming features
```
- choose calculation method
- see your location
- see time left for current prayer / till next prayer
- see chart of times for the day
```

### Support or Contact
You may contact the author at @srmrox or mail@srmrox.me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
